Detailed Description

This class is a wrapper around the Python pickle methods.

Essentially, it serialises and deserialises Python objects into STL strings.

Member Function Documentation

void Pickler::finalise (  )  [static]

This method deletes the global pickle and unpickle methods.

bool Pickler::init (  )  [static]

This static method initialises Pickler.

It loads the Python pickle module and queries methods needed.

std::string Pickler::pickle ( PyObject *  pObj  )  [static]

This method pickles the given object into a binary string.

Parameters:

output The string to fill with the pickled string.
Returns:
True if successfully pickled, otherwise false.

This method unpickles the given binary string into a python object.
